name: Just Between The Two Of Us
content: 有时情话说得不够认真
面对爱 男人比较笨
不表示我对你用情不深
爱的感觉不是只靠浪漫气氛
Just between the two of us together
Just between the two of us forever
应该怎么做别总是背对我
Just between the two of us together
Just between the two of us forever
你有没有发现 我没说
是要你 自己来体会
Just between the two of us together
Just between the two of us forever
